articles.title: Messi sells an apartment in Miami. The interior is stunning, see this luxury!
articles.description: It has been speculated for several years that Leo Messi, a star of PSG and the Argentina national team, will end his football career in the USA. articles.title: GRAINS-U.S. grains rise on production concerns over dry South American weather

articles.title: Argentina to export $37.49 billion in agro-industrial products in 2022 -exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Argentina's agro-industrial exports are expected to reach $37.49 billion next year, $1.52 billion more than was estimated in November, the Rosario grains exchange said in a report on Wednesday.The projected 2022 price increases for products such as soymeal livestock feed, wheat and corn should offset a projected decline in the price in
articles.content:

articles.title: Farmers in Argentina have sold 36.3 mln tonnes of 2020/21 soybeans - agriculture ministry
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers have sold 36.3 million tonnes of soybeans from the 2020/21 season so far, the Agriculture Ministry said on Wednesday in a report that included data through Dec. 15.The rhythm of sales was behind that of the previous season.
articles.content:

articles.title: Rights court hits Argentina, Guatemala, Ecuador governments
articles.description: Two past right-wing governments in Latin America and one from the left have been found guilty by the Inter-American Court of Human Rights, which on Tuesday said the countries’ current governments should make reparations.
articles.content: The court, based in Costa Rica, determined that Argentina's military government systematically took and hid the children of suspected leftists who had been arrested and presumably killed during Operation Condor, which involved several allied right-wi... [2417 chars]
